text: Rolando "Nonoy" Gutierrez Andaya Jr. (March 10, 1969 â€“ June 30, 2022) was a Filipino lawyer and politician. He represented the 1st District of Camarines Sur in the Philippine House of Representatives from 1998 to 2006 and again from 2010 to 2019. He also was the 32nd Majority Floor Leader of the House of Representatives of the Philippines from 2018 until 2019. Andaya Jr. was found dead on June 30, 2022 at his apartment in Naga, Philippines with a gunshot wound to his head at the age of 53. ==References== Category:1969 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Majority leaders of the House of Representatives of the Philippines Category:Lawyers from Manila Category:Politicians from Manila Category:Politicians from Camarines Sur Category:Suicides by firearm
title: Rolando Andaya Jr.
